newsitem.title: JAPAN: Asahi Chemical to form plastics unit in Singapore.
newsitem.headline: Asahi Chemical to form plastics unit in Singapore.

text.p: Asahi Chemical Industry Co Ltd said on Thursday it would form a new subsidiary in Singapore to produce and market polyacetal copolymer.
Polyacetal is a type of plastic used for car parts and electric appliances, a company spokesman said.
The new unit, to be capitalised at $35 million, will build a plant on Pulau Sakra island, he said.
The plant will be capable of producing 20,000 tonnes a year and is expected to start operating in early 1999, he said.
